name: Servicenow
tagline: vCenter Orchestrator package for ServiceNow Integration
body:
### vCenter Orchestrator package for ServiceNow.
Included in the package so far are examples for Create, Read, Update and Delete of:
1. CMDB_CI's
1. Change Request
1. Incident
1. Cost Center
1. Users
1. Service Catalog
1. Examples (and vCAC specific workflow examples)

Also includes a doc explaining how to install into your vCenter Orchestrator and vCloud Automation Center.

To checkout the package:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for or Windows Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Authors and Contributors
Jennifer Galvin (@momecca)
